snippet: The music-themed cable channel is creating "Fuse News," a daily live news show that will be anchored by Ashanti, Elaine Moran, Alexa Chung and Jack Osbourne.
abstract: The music-themed cable channel is creating "Fuse News," a daily live news show that will be anchored by Ashanti, Elaine Moran, Alexa Chung and Jack Osbourne.

headline.main: Fuse Introduces 'Fuse News,' With Some Recognizable Hosts
headline.print_headline: Fuse Channel Creating A News Division
